title.name: Afghanistan Justic and Sustainable Development Organization

about.about: Afghanistan Justice and Sustainable Development Organization (AJSDO) as a social, non-governmental and non-profit organization regardless of political ethnic, racial, positional affiliations, provides voluntary and humanitarian services to the needy people of the society. AJSDO is an afghan local and licensed NGO registered by (5575) registration number in ministry of Economic in 2022.

Beneficiary name.title: Beneficiary name
Beneficiary name.content: Afghanistan Justice and sustainable Development Organization (AJSDO)

Correspondent Bank.title: Correspondent Bank
Correspondent Bank.content: (BMCE) Banque Marocainedu Commerce Exterieur International SA

contact.message: If you wish to learn more about our work or become a partner and/or volunteer, please contact @ajsdo.ngo@gmail.com.

name.label: First name
name.roleMessage: Name must be at least 3 characters long and only contain alphabetic characters and spaces

lastName.roleMessage: Last Name must be at least 3 characters long and only contain alphabetic characters and spaces
